author: forthommel
body:
Forward-port of #18732 onto `9_2_X`.

Proper handling of the begin/end conditions through the usage of a edm::contains (instead of a home-brewed check).

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited` on 931605630d8a0faea6dd4eee2948e25c8a61738a yielded `17 17 16 14 7 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` (with the usual `step1` DAS error on `4.22`)
title: CTPPS: bug fix #2 in run ranges for FEDs channels mapping (9_2_X)
